title: Second phase of conditioning pair light and bell

content.question: In phase one of a study, a researcher classically conditions a dog to salivate to the ringing of a bell. In the second phase, the researcher pairs a flashing light with the ringing of the bell. After several pairings of the light and the bell, the dog will

choices.label: no longer salivate when the bell is rung
only salivate when the bell is rung
salivate when the light is flashed
salivate when the researcher comes into the room

content.answer: salivate when the light is flashed

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
